sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { GrGithub } from 'react-icons/gr' import { FaDribbble, FaTwitter } from 'react-icons/fa' import * as S from './styles' const icons = { twitter: , github: , dribbble: } type socialLinks = { slug: string link: string } type Props = { name: string role: string image: string socialLinks: socialLinks[] description: string } const ProfileCard: React.FC = ({ name, role, image, socialLinks, description }) => ( {name} {role} {socialLinks.map((item) => ( {icons[item.slug]} ))} {description} ) export default ProfileCard
